rukus.text: Ani niscitaca amhi musa ani harunavara motha upakara kela
Ani tyanci ani tyancya janasamuhaci phara mothya duhkha-yatanetuna sutaka keli
Ani tyanci madata keli, tevha teca varcasvasali (vijayi) rahile
Ani amhi tyanna (spasta ani) divya grantha pradana kela
Ani tya doghanna sarala margavara sthira (baki) thevale
Ani amhi tya doghankarita nantara yenaryammadhye hi gosta baki thevali
Musa ani harunavara salama asoe
Nihsansaya, amhi satkarma karanaryanna asaca prakare mobadala pradana karita asato
Nihsansaya, he doghe amacya imanadharaka dasampaiki hote
Ani nihsansaya, iliyasa dekhila paigambarampaiki hote
Jevha te apalya janasamuhacya lokanna mhanale, tumhi allahace bhaya nahi balagata
Kaya tumhi (va'a‌la) navacya murtila pukarata ani sarvanta uttama asa nirmanakartyala soduna deta
Allaha, jo tumaca ani tumacyapurvi ho'una gelelya sarva vadavadilanca svami va palanakarta ahe
Parantu janasamuhacya lokanni tyanna khote tharavile, tevha te avasya (siksa - yatanagrasta avastheta) hajara kele jatila
Matra allahacya sacca pramanika dasankherija
Ani amhi (iliyasaci) subha carca nantaracya lokammadhye baki thevali
Iliyasavara salama aso
Amhi satkarma karanaryanna asaca prakare mobadala pradana karato
Nihsansaya, to amacya imanadharaka dasampaiki hota
Nihsansaya, luta (alai.) Paigambarampaiki hote
Amhi tyanna ani tyancya kutumbiyanna, sarvanna mukti pradana keli
Matra tya mhatarikherija, ji mage rahanaryammadhye rahili
Maga amhi itara sarvanca sarvanasa kela
Ani tumhi tara sakala jhalyavara tyancya vastyanvaruna jata
Ani ratri dekhila, maga kaya tarihi samajuna gheta nahi
